description: Restrictive covenant running with the land
facts: Mike's subdivision has a recorded covenant prohibiting commercial use
The covenant was created 30 years ago and affects all lots
Nancy bought a lot in the subdivision 5 years ago
Nancy wants to open a small bakery in her home
asp_facts: property_claim(claim7). claimant(claim7, subdivision_owners). respondent(claim7, nancy). claim_type(claim7, covenant_enforcement). property_type(claim7, residential_lot). restriction_type(claim7, no_commercial_use). covenant_recorded(claim7, yes). covenant_age_years(claim7, 30). affects_all_lots(claim7, yes). purchase_date_years_ago(claim7, 5). proposed_use(claim7, commercial_bakery).
question: Can the covenant be enforced against Nancy to prevent the bakery?
rationale: A recorded restrictive covenant that touches and concerns the land, has horizontal and vertical privity, and provides notice to subsequent purchasers runs with the land and is enforceable against Nancy.
